column3: [' (StepDescription: Thaw-Thaw the frozen corn by putting it in a sieve and running it under cold water)']
[' (StepDescription: Add-Add the corn into a microwave-safe bowl)']
[' (StepDescription: Add-1 teaspoon of pepper powder to the bowl)']
[' (StepDescription: add-add lime juice to the bowl)']
[' (StepDescription: Add-Add 1 teaspoon salt to the bowl)']
[' (StepDescription: Mix-Mix the contents of the bowl well)']
